snippet: Sheryl Sandberg’s nonprofit organization is partnering with the photo agency to try to eradicate stereotypes in stock images and portray women in more empowering ways.
abstract: Sheryl Sandberg’s nonprofit organization LeanIn.org is partnering with photo agency Getty Images to try to eradicate stereotypes in stock images and portray women in more empowering ways.
lead_paragraph: Sheryl Sandberg’s nonprofit organization is partnering with the photo agency to try to eradicate stereotypes in stock images and portray women in more empowering ways.

headline.main: LeanIn.org and Getty Aim to Change Women’s Portrayal in Stock Photos
headline.print_headline: LeanIn.org and Getty Aim to Change Women’s Portrayal in Stock Photos
